code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Goals(){const[goals,setGoals]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchGoals=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.get('/api/goals',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setGoals(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching goals",error);}};fetchGoals();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Financial Goals"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:goals.map(goal=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[goal.description," - Target: $",goal.targetAmount,", Saved: $",goal.savedAmount]},goal.id))})]});}export default Goals;
